headline: Las Vegas Doubles Down on Sports (Live and Broadcast)
abstract: The arrival of professional hockey and football teams dovetails with a surge in sports betting nationally that has inspired local casinos to redesign their betting areas.
lead_paragraph: When it comes to sports, Las Vegas is more than just a boxing town, thanks largely to the 2017 arrival of the Golden Knights, who went to the N.H.L. championship final in their inaugural season.
keywords: Caesars Palace Hotel and Casino (Las Vegas, Nev)
Las Vegas Convention and Visitors Authority
